Name: UNPLUGGED
About the game: UNPLUGGED is an indie beat 'em up game. with very satisfying skill sets and abilities to unlock and use during combat. the gameplay includes both melee and ranged types of combat. depicting a dystopian futuristic world in which the only way to live is to rent your mind to be exploited by the system in Cyberspace used for mining XCOIN, the only currency worldwide. there are of course illegal activities and people trying to Unplug. UNPLUGGED is a quest for redemption from The System Of Control. Join me on Discord Features ● Beautiful graphics fully hand-drawn animated ● unlockable combating skills for both melees and ranged ● Classic gameplay enhanced with brand-new combat moves ● YEAH! It's Beat 'em UP
